org.arl.fjage

Class AgentLocalRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.arl.fjage.AgentLocalRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AgentLocalRandom
extends java.util.Random
    Utility class for random number generation in simulations. This should be used in preference to java.util.Random to ensure that simulations are repeatable by setting a random number seed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • current

        public static AgentLocalRandom current()
        Returns the current agent's AgentLocalRandom.
        Returns:
        current agent's random number generator.

      • setRootSeed

        public static void setRootSeed(long seed)
        Sets root random number generator seed. This should be set once, at the start of the simulation if repeatable random number sequences are desired.
        Parameters:
        seed - random number seed.

      • nextDouble

        public double nextDouble(double min,
                         double max)
        Generates a random double.
        Parameters:
        min - minimum value to generate.
        max - maximum value to generate.
        Returns:
        random number.

      • nextExp

        public double nextExp(double lambda)
        Generates an exponentially distributed random number with mean 1/lambda.
        Parameters:
        lambda - rate parameter.
        Returns:
        random number.

      • nextExp

        public double nextExp()
        Generates an exponentially distributed random number with unit mean.
        Returns:
        random number.

      • nextGaussian

        public double nextGaussian(double mu,
                           double sigma2)
        Generates a Gaussian distributed random number.
        Parameters:
        mu - mean of the distribution.
        sigma2 - variance of the distribution.
        Returns:
        random number.

      • nextRayleigh

        public double nextRayleigh(double sigma)
        Generates a Rayleigh distributed random number.
        Parameters:
        sigma - scale parameter.
        Returns:
        random number.

      • nextRician

        public double nextRician(double nu,
                         double sigma)
        Generates a Rician distributed random number.
        Parameters:
        nu - location parameter.
        sigma - scale parameter.
        Returns:
        random number.
